# Apple 16-inch MacBook Pro and Apple Mac Pro Procurement for Royal Canadian Mounted Police
### Solicitation No. 2BH3152934/A

### About the Procurement

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) has issued a solicitation for the procurement of Apple 16-inch MacBook Pro and Apple Mac Pro devices. The procurement aims to acquire a total of four (4) Apple 16-inch MacBook Pro devices and four (4) Apple Mac Pro devices, as detailed in the list of deliverables.

### Delivery Details

* Delivery destination: Ottawa, ON
* Delivery date: 60 government working days following contract award

### Required Documents

The solicitation package is available on the Shared Services Canada (SSC) Public Supply Policy (PSPC) portal at the following link: [https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login)

### Evaluation and Award

* The procurement will be evaluated on a lowest evaluated price (LEP) basis
* The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) applies to this procurement
* To be considered for award, bidders must submit their proposals in either English or French and meet the requirements outlined in the solicitation package

### Contact Information

For additional information or clarification on the solicitation, please contact:

* Michael Boualavong, Procurement Officer
* Email: michael.boualavong@ssc-spc.gc.ca
* Phone: 613-402-8895
* Address: 400 Cooper Street, 6th Floor Ottawa, Ontario K2P 2H8
### Note

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with vendors on any aspect of this procurement. The RCMP reserves the right to reject any bid that does not meet the specified requirements. Responses to all inquiries must be made in writing and will only be acknowledged in writing. 

### Closing Date and Time

The deadline for responding to this solicitation is *2023-11-21T14:00:00* . Please submit your proposal on the Shared Services Canada PSPC portal by the specified date and time to be considered for evaluation.
